full_text: COMMITTED TO JUSTICE, TRUTH & SAFETY RICCI~LEOPOLD CONSUMER JUSTICE ATTORNEYS February 5, 2008 VIA HAND DELIVERY Honorable Sandra K. McSorley Circuit Criminal, Division W Palm Beach County Courthouse 205 N Dixie Highway West Palm Beach, FL 33401 Re: State of Florida v. Jeffrey Epstein Case No. 2006 CF 009454 A Dear Judge McSorley: Enclosed please find a copy of Jane Doe's Motion For Protective Order. The undersigned would request ten (10) minutes of the Court's time in which to present its motion. Thank you for your consideration Respectfully submitted, THEODORE LEOPOLD TJL:amd Enclosure cc: Lanna Belohlavek, Esq. (via Facsimile & U.S. Mail - w/ enclosure) Jack A. Goldberger, Esq. (via Facsimile & U.S. Mail - w/ enclosure) 2925 PGA Boulevard Suite 200 Palm Beach Gardens Florida 33410 561.684.6500 fax 561.697.2383 riccilaw.com Page 34 Public Records Request No.: 17-295 CRASHWORTHINESS INSURANCE BAD FAITH MANAGED CARE ABUSE PERSONAL INJURY WRONGFUL DEATH DOJ-OGR-00031555

text_blocks.content: Honorable Sandra K. McSorley Circuit Criminal, Division W Palm Beach County Courthouse 205 N Dixie Highway West Palm Beach, FL 33401
Re: State of Florida v. Jeffrey Epstein Case No. 2006 CF 009454 A

Dear Judge McSorley: Enclosed please find a copy of Jane Doe's Motion For Protective Order. The undersigned would request ten (10) minutes of the Court's time in which to present its motion. Thank you for your consideration

additional_notes: The document is a letter from Theodore Leopold to Judge Sandra K. McSorley regarding the case State of Florida v. Jeffrey Epstein. The letter is dated February 5, 2008, and includes a request for a protective order on behalf of Jane Doe. The document is page 34 of a larger record, as indicated by the page number in the footer.
